text: [Music]
meet Lily a girl who lived a sheltered

controlling parents
finally her parents allowed her to

Lily
it's okay Lily you don't have to face

Lily starts her journey towards managing

the progress is slow and some days the
weight of her anxieties feels unbearable
she feels frustrated that she's still
having bad days
hey is this seat taken

Lily discovers a kindred spirit in Emma

as time goes on Lily's confidence grows
and she learns how to navigate social

though she still has challenging days
Lily knows she's not alone in her

difference
and so Lily discovers that sometimes the
